creator: Eduardo Tunni
trademark: Croissant is a trademark of Eduardo Rodriguez Tunni.
license_desciption: This Font Software is licensed under the SIL Open Font License, Version 1.1. This license is available with a FAQ at: http://scripts.sil.org/OFL
description: Croissant is a typeface inspired by the Parisian spirit, in the people and the landscapes there. The lowercase letters have smooth round shapes, and a nice long out-stroke to connect nearly every glyph, reminding the reader of elegant French handwriting. The uppercases have a classical structure and soft terminals that embody the spirit of this multi-purpose typeface. To contribute to the project contact Eduardo Tunni.
